https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Status associated with offer life cycle.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Frequency Capping Constraints Last Index
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Last index of the capping object. This field is hidden on UI.

items.title: Frequency capping constraint
items.description: Frequency capping constraint defines additional rules based on prior offer proposition, either across all audiences or for a particular profile identity.

xdm:index.title: Index
xdm:index.description: Index of the capping object, this is used as suffix for counter id when we have multi capping objects.  Index starts from 1

xdm:limit.title: Limit
xdm:limit.description: How many times an option can be proposed.

meta:enum.global: Global cap is a constraint on how many times an option can be proposed in totality.
meta:enum.profile: Profile cap is a constraint on how many times an option can be proposed to a certain profile.

xdm:events.title: Events
xdm:events.description: Events of the capping to comply with. Since most of the events don't support offerId level counting, we will start with only support decisioning event, and will extend to support custom event in future phases. Other events to be supported in the future : web-display, web-click, message-delivery, message-open, message-click.

xdm:customQuery.title: Custom PQL query
xdm:customQuery.description: Custom PQL query to match events.

xdm:repeat.title: Repeat
xdm:repeat.description: When true, new counter rule with updated time window will be created. Configure a capping to be repeated (e.g., max times every 1 week). ECS will support repeating config in the rules, scan rules daily, and create a new rule with new expiry when the rule is due for repeating.

xdm:enabled.title: Enabled
xdm:enabled.description: If set to true ECS will created new counter rules with updated time window.

xdm:unit.title: Unit
xdm:unit.description: Unit to comply with.  It will be day/week/month.
